AsgnRsrcApptSchdEvent.name: AsgnRsrcApptSchdEvent
AsgnRsrcApptSchdEvent.description: Represents the assigned resources that are part of various platform events. This object is included in a streamed notification received on the channels for the parent platform events. You canâ€™t subscribe to the AsgnRsrcApptSchdEvent channel directly.

ChangedFields.description: A list of fields that changed.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

IsPrimaryResource.description: Indicates whether the resource is primary.

IsRequiredResource.description: Indicates whether the resource is required.

ServiceResourceId.description: ID of the service resource assigned to the event.

ServiceResourceUserEmail.description: Email of the service resource user assigned to the event.

ServiceResourceUserId.description: ID of the user record associated with the service resource assigned to the event.

ServiceResourceUserName.description: Username as per the user record associated with the service resource assigned to the event.
